meanings.definition: The quality or state of being soapy.
meanings.sent1: The soapinesses of the bubbles made them fun to pop.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the soapinesses of the shampoo as I lathered it in my hair.
meanings.sent3: The dog's playful antics in the bath resulted in soapinesses everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The soapinesses of the ocean waves reminded me of a giant bubble bath.
meanings.sent5: The soapinesses of the dish soap left my hands feeling squeaky clean.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a soapy texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The soapinesses of the wet floor made it slippery to walk on.
meanings.sent2: The soapinesses of the car wash soap left a shiny finish on the vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The soapinesses of the spilled detergent created a slippery mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The soapinesses of the bubbles in the bath floated like tiny clouds.
meanings.sent5: The soapinesses of the soap bar made it easy to wash my hands thoroughly.
